say.name: KID:
say.says: Hey mister! My dad says you're a bad man and that I shouldn't talk to you or you'll hurt me!

say.name: KID:
say.says: But.. I guess if you haven't hurt me yet, you're probably not going to, right?

say.name: KID:
say.says: Great! Wanna play catch with us?

say.name: YOU:
say.says: Sure. If I do, could you tell me what you know about where Kate went?
